scripts.postinstall: bun run generate:routes && bun run generate:sdk
scripts.local: bun run local:db && turbo watch local#api local#web local#admin local#superadmin local:worker#api
scripts.reset:db: docker-compose down && docker-compose up -d --wait && bun run db:push && bun run db:seed --prime
scripts.pretest: bun run with test api bun run --cwd packages/db db:push:force
scripts.test: bun run --filter=@template/permissions test && bun run --filter=@template/db test && bun run --filter=@template/email test && bun run --filter=api test
scripts.test:fe: bun run generate:sdk && bun run generate:routes && bun run --filter=@template/shared test && bun test tests/frontend
scripts.typecheck:fe: bun run generate:routes && bun run --cwd apps/web typecheck && bun run --cwd apps/admin typecheck && bun run --cwd apps/superadmin typecheck
scripts.db:truncate:webhooks: bun run with local api bun run --filter=@template/db db:truncate:webhooks
scripts.generate:routes: bun --cwd apps/web generate:routes && bun --cwd apps/admin generate:routes && bun --cwd apps/superadmin generate:routes
scripts.generate:sdk: bun --cwd apps/api generate:openapi && bun --cwd packages/shared generate:sdk
